author: jta
msg: Initialized committers guide for doc topic started at
(Adding the new page to the site menu caused many pages to change.)

author: danielf
msg: Factored out the creation of the blocks service manager from BlockManager and prepared to make the choice of service manager configurable.
The SitemapServlet creates an own Avalon Context from a Core object that it gets from its parent service manager and its ServletContext, in this way it doesn't need to be Contextualizable anymore.
The setup of the block servlet manager (now in ECMBlockServiceManager), is changed so that there is no need to mark one of the component managers as core anymore. Each block has an own Core object.

msg: Need to get a parent role manager also from service managers that doesn't extend CoreServiceManager.
